name: Citin Loft Pattaya

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had an upgraded room and it was EXCELLENT for the price. The bathroom was well appointed and came with very nice shampoo, soap and toiletries...
reviews.title: Very good for the price

reviews.text: The bed was very comfortable and the T.V. and wifi worked great.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel with Huge Room!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was in a quiter part of Pattaya so we were able to relax and enjoy.
reviews.title: Very bad aesthetic.

reviews.text: The service was very good even if the staff didn't speak English too well. They went out of there way to make sure everything we asked for was taken care of.
reviews.title: First time in Thailand

reviews.text: I would and will stay there again
reviews.title: Decent Hotel . Let down by Housekeeping Policy

reviews.text: Hi All,
reviews.title: Old is Gold.....New property no so good as compared to old Building

reviews.text: This jan it was my 3rd time i had stayed in Citin Loft....As usual i had a awesome experience..
reviews.title: Excellent hotel, very nice.

reviews.text: Manager of this Hotel is Fedric and he is really a gem for Citin Loft....Very Friendly always ready to Help.....all the other staff are also friendly...
reviews.title: Good stay here, but my last stay was better

reviews.text: This time i stayed total 7 nights out of that 6 nights were in old property and last 1 night in New Building.....and this was a disappointment very small rooms...with no balcony......small bathrooms every thing small......Again i will come to this Hotel But in Old building not the New One :-)
reviews.title: THE WORST HOTEL I HAD SEEN IN MY LIFE

reviews.text: One word to say great.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel

reviews.text: Stayed for a week Nov 2011.The hotel is located in a small lane just off Pattaya Klang (Central Road) a good quiet location.A 5 min walk down central road gets you to beach road and soi,s 7 and 8.The rooms r great,large rooms with air con,fan,walk in shower and balcony.Also control panel beside bed, controls all lighting,tv,air con, etc .Basic breakfast though,and a small swimming pool which is covered but i would definately stay again...Staff great and friendly...
reviews.title: Good Quiet Central Location...Great large rooms....

reviews.text: I stayed here for 4 nights in January 2012. I selected this hotel as I have stayed there before and thought it was a good value 3 star hotel.
reviews.title: STILL A DECENT MODERN HOTEL AND RELATIVELY GOOD VALUE FOR MONEY.

reviews.text: They have expanded and I was placed in a room in the new extension. It was smaller than the other rooms and had an integral bath and shower facility rather than the better separate and generous one in the older building.
reviews.title: Room for improvement

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The internet is a problem. Very strange - I could only get some sites – I never managed Hotmail, Yahoo, or several others even using their PC! For Facebook fans – that site did work. I reported this to the staff but as far as I know it still has limited use and the connection is often slow.
reviews.title: great hotel best staff

reviews.text: Breakfast is ok, but they tend to run out of food particularly towards the end of the session.
reviews.title: My review

reviews.text: what a gem of a hotel .the rooms are big and clean.the staff are great.this will be my third visit and it is on a quiet road but very central.it is good if you want to chill out one night but is only around the corner from great bars and restaurants and 10 minute walk from walking street.in my opinion the best value for money in pattaya
reviews.title: citin loft pattaya very good

reviews.text: chris from cardiff
reviews.title: A great experience....

reviews.text: I stayed here for a couple of days in the Suite. The Suite was very spacious, with lots of beautiful wooden furniture. It also had road facing balconies with good view. The rooms were elegant with king size bathrooms and very comfortable beds. The staff was courteous and helpful.The hotel is located slightly off the main road and is some distance from the beach and walking street. You need to hire a motorbike to venture out. Overall the stay was very comfortable, relaxing and fulfilling. Certainly a hotel where i would like to visit again.
reviews.title: very pleasant stay

reviews.text: I stayed 15 days at Citin Loft in Pattaya and had a very pleasant and enjoyable experience. Rooms are big and very clean. Airconditioning was pefectly working. Location is just 2 minutes walking to pattaya Klang and second road, in a quiet convenient position and closed to everything. Everybody from the Staff was impeccable and superkind......
reviews.title: Very Good and fairly new hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed here when it first opened in 2010. It's situated just before pattayaklan. Very near to everything and only a short ride to walking street and beach road. Plenty of motorbike taxi's and bat buses around so travelling around pattaya it simple.This hotel is clean and friendly however the only thing it lacks is an out door swiming pool. Buffet Breakfast is ok. The rooms are fresh clean and new and are a reasonable size and boast kingsize beds. Recommend to people travelling with friends or couples.
reviews.title: for this price the best i have been

description: A new hotel located in the heart of downtown Pattaya with great value of money. Located 10-15 minutes walk to main beach, shops, dining and entertainment destinations. Citin Loft Pattaya offers spacious rooms decorated in a modern understated Thai motif, with relaxing overtones. All rooms feature balcony, modern amenities, and complimentary internet access.
